March 1, 1967
Mr. and Mrs. Henry G. Lee
418 23rd Ave. S.
Grand Forks, North Dakota
Dear Mr. and Mrs. Lee:
Thank you for your recent letter in which you urge my
support of the Educational Television Facilities Act.
As you are well aware. Congressman Robison of New.York has
introduced H. R. 4140 to extend grants for educational TV.
This bill has been referred to the House Interstate and Foreign
Commerce Committee. Yesterday the President delivered his
message to Congress dealing with this subject and we may
very shortly expect bills to be introduced to implement this
message.
You may be sure that I will study this legislation closely
and will certainly keep in mind the views and desires of
you and the many members of the faculty at UND who have
contacted me regarding this matter.
Best wishes.
Sincerely,
-X
MARK ANDREWS
Member of Congress
